body.description: Refresh your skin with pure botanical cleansers. Wash away impurities and preserve your skin's hydration. This formula is powered by Vitamin C, and infused with our unique Triple-C Complex, Olive Squalane, and Kakadu Plum for brighter and healthier skin

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #11,252 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #34 in Facial Cleansing Gels

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Rooted Beauty Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

Driven by a dedication to organic agriculture and formula transparency, all Avalon Organics products are certified to the NSF/ANSI 305 Standard for Personal Care Products Containing Organic Ingredients*. Through this honest, transparent process, the Avalon Organics brand creates products that are safe, effective and conscious of the greater good. *Claim approval was given on April 11, 2011 from QAI with certificate ID C01655324-NSF3HNPC-5.

Humbled by a profound respect for all living beings, Avalon Organics products are vegan and cruelty-free.* The Avalon Organics brand never tests products on animals, and will only source ingredients that the supplier can document are not tested on animals. This commitment to kindness is represented by the leaping bunny logo that appears on product labels. *Cruelty free certified by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008

Nourishing Lavender Bath & Shower Gel Refreshing Lemon Bath & Shower Gel Revitalizing Peppermint Hand & Body Lotion Rejuvenating Rosemary Hand Soap More Better-For-You Products from Avalon Organics Lavender essential oil, quinoa protein and aloe work together to replenish skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple. Lemon essential oil, safflower oil, aloe, shea butter and nutrient-rich beta-glucan work together to restore the skin's lipid balance, leaving it feeling soft and supple. Peppermint essential oil, orange peel and vitamin E, known for their rejuvenating and moisturizing properties, cleanse and nourish your skin. Rosemary essential oil, quinoa protein and vitamin E, known for their moisturizing and purifying properties, cleanse and rejuvenate hands with every wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the brand
reviews.reviewText: Love this brand used for years off and on. Tried this very nice product, not a strong scent which works for me. Skin does feel soft after using and no dried out. Not tons of bubbles which I hate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this face wash!
reviews.reviewText: I used another product for years, that was natural and hard to find. I went to re-order it here and the price of tripled. So after research, I found this product. Love it. Does not dry out your face as my previous face washed it lathers up nicely and my face feels clean and fresh. Just FYI doesn’t remove eye make up completely, but that is not an issue for me. Hope this helps..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product works really well, my face feels so clean after washing. Especially love that it is made from organic ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent face wasg
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a vitamin C face wash and I figured I try this one. I use it every morning and it works pretty well but I do recommend using a moisturizer because it is kind of drying. I also feel a little tingling sensation but I never broke out or anything.Overall It is not a bad face wash I will continue to use it and see how my skin is after 3 weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good and works for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Been using this for years and it works great on sensitive skin. Smells amazing and refreshing too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact it’s a vitamin C facial wash and vitamin C is an antioxidant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: The best of the best! I love this cleanser!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t make my skin dry after washing it
reviews.reviewText: I love it. I have been using this for the last 15 years.
